title: Principal Engineer, Storage Infrastructure
description: Google Cloud Storage (GCS) is an object storage system that supports both external Google Cloud Platform (GCP) customers and internal Google services (e.g., YouTube, Drive, Photos, and Gmail). GCS is GCP's largest storage product and a significant contributor to GCP’s business.
key_qualifications:
15 years of professional software engineering experience
Experience with technical innovation
Experience building distributed systems
Experience in the storage technical domain
preferred_qualifications: Experience with data management for AI/ML training
responsibilities:
Provide the technical outlook and strategy for initiatives and projects in this domain.
Design and lead a multi-year technical roadmap, balancing short and long-term technology investments.
Develop product roadmap for GCS with Product Managers, Engineering, and other cross-functional partners.
Review technical designs from the team and guide technical discussions.
Uphold a culture of technical excellence, innovation, respect, and inclusion.
